action.name: Multiattack
entries: The b'rohg makes four Fist attacks or two Rock attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hideous Rend
entries: The b'rohg uses all four of its hands to target one Large or smaller creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the b'rohg can't make Fist attacks or Rock attacks, and the target takes 49 ({@damage 8d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped into four pieces.
